alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Livingston; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of northern Lenawee, Livingston and western Washtenaw Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from near Byron to 6 miles south of Stockbridge to near Onsted. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pinckney around 645 PM EDT. Manchester around 650 PM EDT. Howell and Oak Grove around 655 PM EDT. Hartland around 700 PM EDT. Dexter around 705 PM EDT. Hamburg around 710 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 715 PM EDT. Brighton around 720 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake, Tipton, Conway Township and Pinckney State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
